Name: Portal war
About the game: In this game you have to fight with enemies who use portals to capture the world. Units come out to meet each other on the battlefield and fight for their lands. You are able to influence the course of the battle with the help of magic. Using abilities you can destroy enemies. For gold, you can summon mercenaries to fight for you. The main goal is very simple - bring as many allies as possible to destroy the enemy portals. The fate of the world is in your hands! Game Features: Beautiful visuals Interesting gameplay that is easy to understand Different dangerous enemies Steam Achievements support
